mapper.insert: insert into ChatRoom(chat_room_id, product_id, buyer_id, seller_id, title) values(#{chat_room_id}, #{product_id}, #{buyer_id}, #{seller_id}, #{title})
mapper.select: select p.product_id, p.product_img1, p.seller_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.year_purchase, p.pay_method, p.trade_status, p.trade_area, TX.buyer_id, Review.review_content from Product p LEFT OUTER JOIN TX on p.product_id = TX.product_id and p.product_id = #{product_id} and TX.is_reserved = true LEFT OUTER JOIN Review on TX.product_id = Review.product_id where p.product_id = #{product_id}

SELECT room.chat_room_id, room.product_id, room.seller_id, room.buyer_id, room.title, Product.product_img1, message.message, message.send_time FROM ChatRoom room inner join Product on room.product_id = Product.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ChatMessage message on room.chat_room_id = message.chat_room_id and message.chat_id in (select max(chat_id) from ChatMessage group by chat_room_id) where room.buyer_id = #{member_id} and message.message is not null or room.seller_id = #{member_id} and message.message is not null order by message.send_time desc
mapper.update: update Product set trade_status = #{trade_status} where product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ChatMessage(chat_room_id, message_type, alarm, user_id, message, send_time) values(#{chat_room_id},#{message_type},#{alarm},#{user_id},#{message},#{send_time})
